products.description2:
Toshi offers single tube Hydro Testers equipped with oil/water high pressure (Up to 5000 psi) intensifiers, automatic handling system and chart type pressure recorders according to API/ASTM/BS standards.


  • OD Sealing Type.
  • Oil and Water Intensifier.
  • Continuous Chart Type Pressure recorders & Pressure transducers for each tube results.
  • Closed Circuit blocking heads for automatic balancing of end thrust.
  • Quick change tooling.
  • Computerized data acquisition system.
